name: UWA Global Excellence Scholarship
description: Awarded for exceptional academic performance, providing partial tuition coverage for the entire postgraduate study period.

name: Scholarships for Top Three Academic Ranking
description:
Recurrently awarded for ranking within the top three students each semester. The scholarship included a complete tuition waiver for the subsequent semester, sponsored by the government. Achieved in: 
- Grade 10, Semester 1 
- Grade 11, Semester 2 
- Grade 12, Semesters 1 and 2
institution: Kaohsiung Vocational High School of Commerce (KSVCS)
